overview: Ettore Scola, in 1973, made the film Trevico-Torino, the story of a boy from the south who emigrated to Turin in search of work. Ten years later, Scola returns to the city to shoot Wish I Fly, in which the little protagonist embodies the hope of a better future. That child, forty years later, has spent more than half of his life in prison

production_companies.name: Archivio Audiovisivo del Movimento Operaio e Democratico

title: Massimino
